title: Peach Demon - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Revenge   Short Story
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
One is a poor demonic door keeper who was buried by his pig-like subordinate even before he died. The other, is the spirit of a peach blossom tree who is about to wither up and die, and yet is extremely wealthy.

An accident made love bloom in the air.

This story will depict their first meeting, their separation, and their reunion.>
